Label.en: Some scandals have involved this painting!
Label.fr: Il y a eu des scandales autour de ce tableau !
Label.es: Some scandals have involved this painting!

Label.en: Firstly, it was supposed to be repatriated to Italy, since it was taken by Napoleon’s army in 1797
Label.fr: Tout d'abord, il aurait dû être rapatriée en Italie, puisqu'il a été pris par l'armée de Napoléon en 1797
Label.es: Firstly, it was supposed to be repatriated to Italy, since it was taken by Napoleon’s army in 1797

Label.en: But the Louvre’s curator at that time argued that it was too fragile to move, so they kept it! How cheeky of him!
Label.fr: Mais le conservateur du Louvre avança qu'il était trop fragile pour être bougé, donc ils l'ont gardé ! C'est culotté !
Label.es: But the Louvre’s curator at that time argued that it was too fragile to move, so they kept it! How cheeky of him!

Label.fr: En 1989, sa restauration engendra une controverse...

Label.en: The restorers even changed the colour of this character
Label.fr: Les restaurateurs ont changé la couleur de ce personnage
Label.es: The restorers even changed the colour of this character

Label.en: He used to be clothed in red! Many art fans were angry that the museum was changing the painting…
Label.fr: Il était habillé en rouge ! Beaucoup d'amateurs d'art étaient en colère que le musée modifie le tableau...
Label.es: He used to be clothed in red! Many art fans were angry that the museum was changing the painting…

Label.fr: Il a également subi deux accidents !

Label.en: Once, it was rained on due to a leak, and another, it was dropped and damaged while being moved!
Label.fr: Une fois, il a plu dessus à cause d'une fuite ; une autre, on l'a fait tomber et endommagé en le déplaçant !
Label.es: Once, it was rained on due to a leak, and another, it was dropped and damaged while being moved!
